budgetClassifications.origin: Open codelist that allows you to choose an origin of the monetary funding.
budgetClassifications.classifications: Open codelist that allows you to choose a budget clasification.
budgetClassifications.level: ID to identify the hierarchy level for the concept inside a classification.
budgetClassifications.id: ID to identify a specific value of the concept.
budgetClassifications.description: Descripction of the specific value of the concept.

measures.id: ID to identify the specific accruing moment in which the budget's value will be expressed.
